events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th, requesting to start the claim process immediately.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords related to car collision and vehicle damage.
An agent specializing in auto collision claims was assigned to handle this claim and reach out to the customer for next steps.
The insurer acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that a thorough investigation would be conducted promptly.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
All requested documents, including police report and pictures of the car damage, were submitted by the customer in a timely manner.
The claims department initiated the investigation to verify damages and liability related to the reported vehicle accident.
The investigation concluded confirming the accident details matched provided evidence and liability assessment was completed.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and associated expenses was proposed to the insured for approval.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciated the fast response and fair evaluation.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager after verifying all conditions and customer acceptance.
Payment to cover the repair costs was issued promptly to the customerâ€™s bank account as per the settlement agreement.
The claim file was closed following payment issuance and confirmation of repair completion from the customer.
All claim documents and records were archived securely for future reference as per company policy.
